# !/usr/bin/env bash

wget https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases/download/v0.111.3/hugo_0.111.3_Linux-64bit.tar.gz &&
tar -xzf hugo_0.111.3_Linux-64bit.tar.gz &&
chmod +x hugo

./hugo
